item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, December 28, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Netflix tells writers to have characters "announce what they're doing" (25 points | 10 comments)

26. A design flaw in the Windows 3D Pipes screen saver pointed out by a customer (9 points | 1 comment)
